#summary User stories for JAKOB

Here you can see all the different user stories created for JAKOB. If you would like to create additional user stories, please read the "[UserStories#How_to_create_user_stories How to create user stories]" section first.
=User stories=

  * As a *User* I want to collect attributes from different sources so the I can pass on more attributes to a service.
  * As an *Administrator* I want to easily set up a new attribute collection so that I do not have to code.
  * As an *Administrator* I want to easily change the configuration of an attribute collection to accomodate for changes in an external data source.

=User roles=

|| *User roles* ||
|| User ||
|| Administrator ||

=How to create user stories=

All user tories should be on the form:

_As a `[`user role`]` I want to `[`goal`]` so that `[`benefit`]`

Please set the user role in bold and capitalise it.

Keep the user stories as short as possible.

If you introduce a new user role please ad it to the "[UserStories#User_roles User roles]" section.
